about.title: About Me
description: I'm a professional passionate about solving complex problems through pragmatic data and analytics solutions. I work across the entire data project lifecycle, from requirements gathering with stakeholders to delivering robust solutions.

My expertise lies in accurately diagnosing business challenges and translating them into scalable data architectures, whether in cloud (AWS, Azure) or on-premise environments. I design complete BI and analytics solutions tailored to each client's specific needs.
With a focus on value delivery, I build efficient data pipelines, implement engineering best practices, and ensure solutions are sustainable and scalable for the long term.
highlights: Requirements gathering and data problem diagnostics
Architecture and design of BI solutions in Cloud and On-Premise
Development of real-time and batch data pipelines
Implementation of Data Lakes, Data Warehouses, and Lakehouse
Consulting on data strategy and governance
Optimization of ETL/ELT processes and SQL queries
